import React, { createElement } from "react" import memesData from "./memesData" export default function Main() { let [memeImg, setMemeImg] = React.useState({ toptext: "", bootmtext: "", randdomImge: "https://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg" }) let [memeData, setMemeData] = React.useState() let button = () => { let meme = memesData.data.memes let randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random(meme) * meme.length) let randomMeme = meme[randomNumber] setMemeImg(prevSetMemeImg => prevSetMemeImg = randomMeme) } return (
) }
